Over the summer of my second last year in secondary school I put a project together for a competition called Smart Class which was sponsored by Intel Ireland, the Educational Company of Ireland and Steljes, and in the end the entry won the whole competition which I was/am delighted about.

Check out some of the things other people had to say about my entry:

“A student’s vision brings national honours to Loreto, Milford” - Donegal Democrat

“Shaun Sweeney’s hard work, dedication and talent is truly admirable. He has secured a world-class learning environment for the incoming first years and he should be extremely proud of himself.” - Charlie McConalogue, Fianna Fáil TD

“All first-year pupils at the school will now get laptop computers after an entry by 5th year pupil Shaun Sweeney won the SmartClass competition” - Irish Times

More coming soon.
